trans-unit.source: File path: Which file to should be used to display Google Pointers?
Ajax refresh: How many seconds should the ajax call wait to refresh the parkings?

Override titles: If you want to change the title coming from CSV enter a new line here with following format: 5 = new title. Where 5 is the row of CSV beginning from 0. So with our example we override the title of the sixth row in CSV.

Create links: If you want to add a link for a specific parking you can add a new row here with following format: 5 = 123. Where 5 is the row of CSV beginning from 0. So with our example we set a link to pageUid 123 in row 6.
Email of sender: The senders email address. If not given the extension tries to get one from INSTALL_TOOL.
Name of sender: The senders name. If not given the extension tries to get one from INSTALL_TOOL.
Email of receiver: The receivers email address.
Name of receiver: The receivers name.
